safetyTips: Masks are ironed with a hot iron to kill bacoteria before packaging with latex gloves. Hand delivered by bike in an envelope.
name: Maggie Bulman Masks
description: Maggie Bulman Costumes is now making reusable fabric protective masks. The masks are double layered with a pouch to insert an impermeable layer for greater protection. No plastic & no landfill waste!  Available in a variety of designs. Please check out the website. Bicycle delivery.
